name: Xcel Infiniti LTD Hood 2mm - Unisex
description: A light, tough surf hood to prevent brain-freeze in cool water. It has an integrated reflective lining and a seal to block out the cold.2mm neoprene provides comfortable insulation in water temperatures around 11 to 14˚C.Radiant Rebound lining reflects heat back toward your body.Cinchable seal prevents warm water from escaping and cold water from entering.Hidden seams are taped for added durability.Contoured fit for comfort.
